channel.title: Kantas - Lumb, sweet, bridge
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i625.photobucket.com/albums/tt332/zs4yswtf/th_KANTAS.png[/img] [i]Projected release: 7/1/12[/i][/center] [b]Introduction[/b] [i]The objective of Kantas is to incorporate new ideas into the quests, skills, and just general things such as coins. There will still be some old features of the features, such as woodcutting or mining, and some skills will be harder, some easier.[/i]
[b]Features[/b] No development Started development Finished development [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li]Jewelry[/li] [li][list] [li]All gems craftable[/li] [li]All rings, amulets, and necklaces craftable[/li] [/list][/li][/ul] [b]General[/b]
[ul][li]Skill Menus[/li] [list] [li]Attack[/li] [li]Strength[/li] [li]Defence[/li] [li]Ranged[/li] [li]Prayer[/li] [li]Magic[/li] [li]Hitpoints[/li] [li]Agility[/li] [li]Herblore[/li] [li]Thieving[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Fletching[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Runecrafting[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Firemaking[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li] [li]Farming[/li] [/list] If you have any suggestions at all, please post them and I will see what I can do.[/ul]

item.title: Kantas - Lumb, sweet, bridge
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[center]
Projected release: 7/1/12[/center]
Introduction
The objective of Kantas is to incorporate new ideas into the quests, skills, and just general things such as coins. There will still be some old features of the features, such as woodcutting or mining, and some skills will be harder, some easier.

Features
No development
Started development
Finished development
Crafting

[ul][li]Jewelry[/li]
[li][list]
[li]All gems craftable[/li]
[li]All rings, amulets, and necklaces craftable[/li]
[/list][/li][/ul]
General

[ul][li]Skill Menus[/li]
[list]
[li]Attack[/li]
[li]Strength[/li]
[li]Defence[/li]
[li]Ranged[/li]
[li]Prayer[/li]
[li]Magic[/li]
[li]Hitpoints[/li]
[li]Agility[/li]
[li]Herblore[/li]
[li]Thieving[/li]
[li]Crafting[/li]
[li]Fletching[/li]
[li]Slayer[/li]
[li]Runecrafting[/li]
[li]Mining[/li]
[li]Smithing[/li]
[li]Fishing[/li]
[li]Cooking[/li]
[li]Firemaking[/li]
[li]Woodcutting[/li]
[li]Farming[/li]
[/list]
If you have any suggestions at all, please post them and I will see what I can do.[/ul]

Read full topic
